name: Mr. Jhon Khed
desc: I have ordered green they send me blue i did not like that. But the product was good it looks very good but the packaging was 10/10 and the product quality was really good awesome watch.It is value for money.recomeded very much.

name: Mr. Akkhac
desc: I recomeded, And Thanks to Cellar's brother for giving me a beautiful watch. I got what I wanted. You can buy it without fear.

name: Cavalier Gray
desc: Nice watch. Nice quality. Though I expected the belt color to be a bit darker. Nonetheless, I liked the product. It took me 8 days to get the product. Product quality is good compared to the price.

name: Jhan Legend
desc: I am sorry for that, i couldn't provide my opinion or real review on the delevered time in case of my exam preparesion. ..After 3/4 days later  i thought i should review on it.So i am rating this product 10 out of 10 on this cheap price range. alhamdulillah i am fully â˜º happy..

name: Ms. Nidu Duke
desc: I didn't get the original color of the dial, I got black. But the product is good. I did not give the review immediately. I gave a review for 2 weeks. Don't be fooled.

name: Kuten Rogue
desc: Nice watch. Nice quality. Though I expected the belt color to be a bit darker. Nonetheless, I liked the product. It took me 8 days to get the product. Product quality is good compared to the price.

name: Harness Jhon
desc: i love this watch.. i got this same watch as the picture is shown. but the belt? its kinda like not leather but anyway with this budget, its perfect.

name: Captain Vulad
desc: Watches were very good compared to the price.product is so so according to price. wrist belt is quite hard, hope it become softer with time, Very recommended seller and nice behaviour overall,

name: Captain Matte
desc: It took me 8 days to get the product, Strap Color ta pic e ektu deep dekhano hoyeche. Kintu bastobe Amon na. Deep color hoile ei daam e Sei ta watch hoito.

name: Rohan Scout
desc: I never dared to buy anything online before, after getting some product orders from Daraj, now it feels good, thanks to Daraj for delivering the right product at the right time.
